posts.post_content:
Joined this forum over 6 years ago to start my collection. Haven’t hit 40 cards yet and want to add to my collection of polar bears. Can’t really afford the big boys, but would love to find a poor condition Mathewson.

Also wish I would have bought a Titus when they were only $100 😂 please pm me or email me at [url]thomasnace@gmail.com[/url] if you can help me build this collection!
